text: Ron Raphael Braunstein is an American rapper, producer, director, and Label CEO better known by his stage name, Necro. His stage name is derived from the Slayer song, Necrophobic. Necro invented the term "death rap" which he describes as ultraviolent hip hop. Necro is the younger brother of other local rapper, Ill Bill. He is a Jew of Israeli and Romanian ethnicity. == Discography == ===Studio albums=== Necro has released 9 studio albums: Year Album 1997 Get On Your Knees EP 1998 Cockroaches EP 2000 I Need Drugs 2001 Gory Days 2004 The Pre-Fix for Death 2005 The Sexorcist 2007 Death Rap 2010 Die! 2012 The Murder Murder Kill Kill EP ==Controversy== He has also been involved in controversy which includes a riot that erupted at one of his shows when he didn't show up in Vancouver, British Columbia, Necro being fined $3000 for fracturing a man's jaw in Perth, Western Australia, being sued by Ani DiFranco after he sampled one of her songs and his music was connected to a murder in London, Ontario because the murderer was a fan of Necro and was inspired by his song "Garbage Bag". == References == ==Other websites== * Necro's Official website * Necro's Myspace Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Movie directors from New York (state) Category:Singers from New York City
